Name: Slimefrog
About the game: Prepare to Fall......... A lot......... Use your tongue as a grappling hook to navigate up an exotic and unforgiving world, while being verbally abused by a flying snake. Be careful, any fall can send you all the way back down... GAMEPLAY: Slimefrog is a high stakes fast-paced grappling hook adventure Use your tongue as a grappling hook to climb to the top of an exotic world Lick platforms to quickly accelerate yourself towards them. While mid-air, you only have 4 licks. These reset every time you land back on the ground or hit a roof. Get insulted by a flying snake for every mistake THE WORLD: Traverse through 9 distinct areas while being verbally abused by a flying snake. Listen to a unique soundtrack with a new track for each level. Experience the pain of losing all your progress, and being insulted for it at the same time. Discover the dark secret that lies at the top of the world!
